mapper.sql: a.id, a.name, a.title, a.remarks, a.create_by as "createBy.username", a.create_date as "createDate", a.update_by as "updateBy.username", a.update_date as "updateDate", a.pid, a.sort, a.href, a.target, a.icon, a.is_show as "isShow", a.permission
left join sys_user su1 on su.id = a.create_by left join sys_user su2 on su.id = a.update_by
mapper.select:
SELECT , su1.name as "createBy.name", su2.name as "updateBy.name" FROM sys_menu a
WHERE a.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_menu( id, name, title, remarks, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, pid, sort, href, target, icon, is_show, permission ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{title}, #{remarks}, #{createBy.username}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.username}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{pid}, #{sort}, #{href}, #{target}, #{icon}, #{isShow}, #{permission} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_menu SET name = #{name}, title #{title}, remarks = #{remarks}, update_by = #{updateBy.username}, update_date = #{updateDate}, pid = #{pid}, sort = #{sort}, href = #{href}, target = #{target}, icon = #{icon}, is_show = #{isShow}, permission = #{permission}, WHERE id = #{id}
